TEXT: NL The imbalance of this place must be #r~removed.~

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some foul ritual. NL As you approach, they turn to you in unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, sickly looking hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~spirit,~ ~and~ ~once~ ~again~ ~feel~ ~life~ ~within~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
